TopicTitle: My KSP is crashing on startup

Articles.Content:
Hey.

My KSP crashes on the startup loading screen (About when ModuleManager loads its cache) and I'm just looking for some insight to know exactly what happened.

The error log states that "mono.dll caused an Access Violation"

Here, take a look.

Error Log:

https://zerobin.net/?4e5715fd66102d09#5rxtseYOwmnOdIaPvmIoYwnTk5eKYIHmOEI8/N9rucw=

Output Log:

https://zerobin.net/?14e06738abecf744#shrXhbunWsJHZFO6lR2ih8GHbp333pw7BVm+pa8nHJU=

Any help would be appreciated.
According to the error log you are running the 32 bit version of KSP and running out of memory.  Try running the 64 bit version of KSP and see if that helps.
You also use a lot of outdated mods like FAR.
